title: Handle an Order with High Fraud Risk
description: An online order is automatically flagged by the system as having a high risk of fraud (e.g., mismatched billing/shipping addresses, proxy IP).

tasks.description: The system places a new order on 'Fraud Review' hold and creates an alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is prevented from being fulfilled automatically.

tasks.description: A fraud analyst reviews the order details and the reasons it was flagged.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst confirms the high-risk indicators.

tasks.description: The analyst attempts to contact the customer via phone to verify the order details.
tasks.expected_outcome: The phone number is out of service, increasing the suspicion of fraud.

tasks.description: The analyst cancels the order to prevent a fraudulent shipment and chargeback.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is cancelled with 'Suspected Fraud' as the reason.
